name: Phalanx
overview: Not to be confused by the Amiga Shooter of the same name (or the completely unrelated shooter of the same name on the SNES), Phalanx on the Commodore 64 is a German language single-player version of the standard 4-in-a-row game (like Connect 4). This game was developed by Daniel Durstewitz & Waldemar Raaz and published in Computer Kontakt 1985/01.
